Name: parotid disease
Definition: A parotid disease characterized by the inflammation of one or both parotid glands.

Name: submandibular gland disease
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that involves attack of immune cells which destroy the exocrine glands that produce tears and saliva.

Name: benign lymphoepithelial lesion of salivary gland
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that involves attack of immune cells which destroy the exocrine glands that produce tears and saliva.

Name: necrotizing sialometaplasia
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by chronic enlargement of the glands of the head and neck

Name: mucocele of salivary gland
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by chronic enlargement of the glands of the head and neck

Name: sialolithiasis
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by chronic enlargement of the glands of the head and neck
Synonym: Stone of salivary gland or duct

Name: obsolete sickle-cell/Hb-C disease with crisis
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by chronic enlargement of the glands of the head and neck
Synonym: Sickle cell-hemoglobin C disease with crisis (disorder)
